title: Ep. - 442 - ADULTS ADOPTING ADULTS PARIS IN LOVE
description:
Kate reviews the Real Housewives of New Jersey premiere.

 

Danny Passman, Executive Producer of Adults Adopting Adults on A&E, which is stories of grown adults who are pursuing the unusual route to the American family: adult adoption. Six different pairs with individual motivations embark on a journey to add an adult family member to their households.

 

Wedding event planner Stephen Mcgee helps Kate review Paris in Love on Peacock TV.

 

 

Reality Life with Kate Casey
